messages.title: Our pledges to you...
messages.content: Secure the recovery, Raise family living standards, Build a high tech economy, Protect frontline services, Strengthen fairness in communities

messages.title: Labour's record:
messages.content: NHS waiting lists slashed, Vast improvements in school buildings, Reduced crime, Winter Fuel Allowance, Pension Credit, Sure Start, Free bus travel for the over 60's, Minimum Wage

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Enthusiastic about the Climate Change Bill and the Green Investment Bank.
Measures announced in the budget will help sustain small independent businesses.
Supporting lowering the voting age to 16.

issues.economy: Secure the recovery, Raise family living standards, Build a high tech economy.
issues.education: Vast improvements in school buildings, Supporting lowering the voting age to 16.
issues.environment: Enthusiastic about the Climate Change Bill and the Green Investment Bank.
issues.socialWelfare: Winter Fuel Allowance, Pension Credit, Sure Start.

leaflet.personalStatement: Although this is a national election you may wish to know my views on some more local matters.

contactInformation.address: 11 Locksbrook Court, Locksbrook Road, Bath BA1 3EN.

images.caption: Labour's pledges and records on a leaflet.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Opposes the Bath Transportation Package as it is not the solution to Bath's transport and congestion problems. Supports the introduction of free swimming for children thanks to Labour Government funding, regrets that in B&NES this is currently only available to those on free school meals.
